pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Logging refactor unique path functions to ign-common

content.raw:
I fixed the common3 bottles last night so they wouldn't require Xcode:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/677

this bottle uses a commit from the following pull request, which was committed after the unique path PR had been merged

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/189/profiler-give-hint-on-osx-to-find/commits

I need to update it again for battery support
content.html:
I fixed the common3 bottles last night so they wouldn't require Xcode:

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/677

this bottle uses a commit from the following pull request, which was committed after the unique path PR had been merged

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/189/profiler-give-hint-on-osx-to-find/commits

I need to update it again for battery support
